author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Schluter LED niche cable membrane tip…I snapped the stainless steel cover into the connection box. The slot faces toward the shower and allows the light to be centered. Tile won’t bond to stainless steel. So the self-adhesive patch is needed for that reason. This full LED niche installation can be seen at homerepairtutor.com 🔥 many thanks to Schluter for sponsoring this video ❤️#showerniche #schlutersystems #showerremodel #homerepairtutor #brandpartner
title: Schluter LED Niche Cable Membrane Tip - #shorts #schlutersystems #homerepairtutor #brandpartner
